ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Title: Steel Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: Steel Vengeance: Steel Vengeance (Steel Wind's sister) attacks John Blaze while the Ghost Rider appears to be in a coma. With the help of the members of the Quentin Carnival she is defeated. Ghost Rider wakes up from his coma and says that he knows where Dan Ketch is being kept and how to get him back to this plane of existence. Meanwhile, Lilith watches everything through Nakota's eyes.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:44:17. [Issue ID 85594]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Steel Vengeance [Sadae Tsumura],Lilin [Lilith,Clara Menninger,Eli McIntyre,Wolf,Styge,Nakota],Tim Andrews (dies)
